FuncDef: This command specifies in what DHCPv6 option to retrieve the value to be used as lookup key in the RADIUS proxy cache.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use the circuit Id to match against.
Specifies the MAC address to match against.
Specifies the remote ID to match against.
Specifies the option number that the DHCP server uses to send the identification strings to the client. Values-1 to 124.
Specifies the DHCPv6 option to retrieve the value to be used as lookup key in the RADIUS Proxy cache. Values-1 to 65535.
